text:
Hey dude! Sorry for my late response! I have been a little under the weather these last few days! Excited to help you where I can!

Ok cool - doing medicine is a great way to help people, but there is a lot of hard work involved. My sister seems to work 60+ hours each week, which is a long time! Most people will work 35-40 hours a week. You might struggle to do business on the side whilst working those hours, but you could try!

What A-levels are you working towards at the moment?

Why medicine?

And, if you were to start a business, what would your business do?!
